name: Purposes
text:
PART III.  HAWAII BRANCHES OF OUT-OF-STATE FOREIGN BANKS

 [§412:13-300]    This part is generally intended to ensure that interstate state branches of out-of-state foreign banks may be established and operated in this State:



	(1)	To the extent consistent with the provisions of section 5 of the federal International Banking Act; and
	(2)	Under terms and conditions that are generally comparable to and no less favorable than those applicable to, the establishment of interstate federal branches in this State by out-of-state foreign banks. [L 1996, c 155, pt of §2]
